string.name: name
string.value: A Request from Staff Sergeant Charlie
I found Staff Sergeant Charlie at Orbis, and he asked me to get him #b2 refined #t4011005#s#k while giving me an item which is to be given to Master Sergeant Fox.
I gave Orihalcon to Sergeant Charlie. What would he give Master Sergeant Fox?
What? You came all the way to here by #b#p2020003##k's request? I thought I was the only survivor. I knew that nothing can hurt #b#p2020003##k. HAHA!
It is good to hear that he is alive. So he is working at El Nath huh? Okay... I found #b#t4031049##k and this would be somewhat related to our mission.
So #b#p2020003##k will also be wating for this. I will give this to you if you give me 2 #b#t4011005#. You can't say that you have met me without this.
So #b#p2020003##k will also be wating for this. I will give this to you if you give me 2 #b#t4011005#. You can't say that you have met me without this.
So #b#p2020003##k will also be wating for this. I will give this to you if you give me 2 #b#t4011005#. You can't say that you have met me without this.
